meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>manor</kanji> <kanji>park</kanji> is just a <vocabulary>manor</vocabulary>. That's what a manor is, though. It's a big house that has an awesome garden/park around it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
